donuts.name: Donuts

coffee.name: Kona Coffee

about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle: Where Premium Kona Coffee Meets Artisan Donuts
about.coffeeDonutStory: We're bringing together MOCHILAND and HONOLULU COFFEE to create the ultimate café experience! Coffee and donuts are the perfect combination - the rich, bold flavors of premium Kona coffee complement the sweet, delicate texture of artisan mochi donuts. Experience both exceptional brands in one amazing location in the heart of Waikiki!
about.konaStory: Kona coffee is world-renowned for its exceptional quality, grown exclusively on the volcanic slopes of Hawaii's Big Island. HONOLULU COFFEE sources only the finest 100% Kona beans, delivering a smooth, rich flavor with subtle notes of chocolate and nuts. Combined with MOCHILAND's innovative mochi donuts, we offer the best of Hawaiian craftsmanship and quality.
about.ctaText: Visit us in Waikiki and discover why KONA COFFEE + MOCHILAND DONUTS = the perfect match!

footer.copyright: © 2025 Kona Coffee Donut? All rights reserved.

meta.title: Kona Coffee Donut? | Handcrafted with Aloha in Hawaii
meta.description: Experience authentic Hawaiian coffee and artisan donuts. Made with 100% Kona coffee in collaboration with Honolulu Coffee and Mochiland.
